Package oracle.mapviewer.share

Contains the shared mapping constructs such as map bounds, scale bar, map request components and miscellaneous utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayParameter The ArrayParameter class defines a ARRAY type binding parameter for a predefined dynamic theme.
Field A Field object typically represents a value of a particular type or table column.
GeoRasterBitmapMask From Database 11 each GeoRaster record may have binary image masks.
LabelingHints This interface contains all the public text labeling hints and parameters that can be controlled by a MapViewer user.
LabelingHints.Key  
NorthArrow Class to represent a North arrow in a map.
RenderingRule RenderingRule represents an advanced definition or rule for using styles when rendering a theme's features.
SizeDefinition Class to represent an individual size with an associated unit.
SizeDefinition2D  
ThemeStyleInfo This bean class describes how a style is used in the context of a theme.
XMLUtil Utility class to handle special characters of XML strings.
 

Package oracle.mapviewer.share Description

Contains the shared mapping constructs such as map bounds, scale bar, map request components and miscellaneous utility classes.
